name: BinPuzzlin
description:
BinPuzzlin is a puzzle game with infinitely generated levels.

There are two rules:

  1. Each row and column must have an equal number of cells of each color.
  2. There can be no more than two cells of the same color in sequence.

Controls:

  • LMB - Toggles cell color 1/clear
  • RMB - Toggles cell color 2/clear
  • R - New puzzle of same type
  • U - Undo most recent move
  • H - Hint (Either repairs your game back to the last valid state or gives you a hint toward the next value move. Hints get progressively less hinty and more solvey with each press between valid moves)
  • B - Cycles to the next background
  • N - Toggles numbers on and off
  • C - Cycles palette
  • S - Take beautiful action shots of your game (to the BinPuzzlin_Data folder)
